Combat
Hit Points: 89 Armor Class: 21 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Fighter: 20 (strength; trained); Monk: 16 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Bola (+13 1d6+3 B R20'; dexterity; expert); Fist (+13 1d6+3 B; dexterity; expert); Light Mace (+13 1d4+3 B; dexterity; expert); Main-gauche (+13 1d4+3 P/S; dexterity; expert)
Combat Notes:

Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4

Monk Resiliency: +21 Hit Points
Powerful Fist: Fists inflict 1d6 HP damage
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Unconventional Weaponry (Spirit Thresher): Weapon Familiarity (Spirit Thresher)
Fighter Weapon Mastery: Critical hits with a master proficiency weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Flurry Of Blows: (1) Makes 2 unarmed Strikes once per 1d4 rd
Powerful Fist: Suffers no attack penalty for inflicting lethal damage with unarmed attacks
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Save: Fortitude: +13 (constitution; master); Reflex: +13 (dexterity; expert); Will: +10 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Bravery: Save Expert (Will)
Perfection's Path (Fortitude): Save Master (Fortitude)
Bravery: Successes on Will saves vs. fear are critical successes, and the initial severity of frightened conditions is reduced by 1
Notes
Validation Errors:
Advanced Kata Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 6 and basic kata feat (currently 1)
Class Feats Allocation: 5 available vs. 7 allocated
Monk Moves Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 8 and monk dedication feat (currently 1)
Monk Resiliency Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 4, monk dedication feat (currently 1) and class hit points (currently 10) <= 8
Monk's Flurry Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 10 and monk dedication feat (currently 1)
Perfection's Path (Fortitude) Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 12, monk dedication feat (currently 1) and fortitude rank (currently 3) >= 2
